revised_title: The Role of Theory of Mind in Autistic Communication
tldr: This article discusses the communication problems in autistic individuals and how they relate to the theory of mind. It explains that autistic individuals often have difficulties understanding mental states in themselves and others, which affects their ability to communicate effectively. The author suggests that language and communication are separate concepts, and that communication can take place without language. The article also explores the different manifestations of autism and how they may be related to the underlying theory of mind.
